title: Mbitr
author: Mbitr
created_time: May 31, 2022, 01:27:06 PMLast edit: June 01, 2022, 10:19:57 AM by Mbitr
content: Papersafe Wallet and Casascius Aluminium Coin setLot 1 Papersafe Wallet - UNLOADED Lot 2. Casascius Aluminium Coloured 6 Coin setSorry shit images again Colours SilverPurple GreenRedOrangeBlue Some of the Coins have very slights scuff marks but nothing major AUCTION TERMSBidding in BTC only Starting bid for each item 0.00BtcBidding format - 1. 0.0001                        2. 0.0001etc Min bid increments 0.0001BTCEnd Time - Sunday 5th June at 7pm GMTSniping - any bid made in the last 10 mins, will increase the auction time by 10 mins from that last bid , eg, if a  bid comes in at 6.57 , the New end time will be 7.07 and only for that particular item.Postage and shipping is to be paid by the buyer to be discussed on auction win I will reach out to the winner via pm with all relevant details . Careful of scammers. Check all links - I will only PM after the auction has ended and ONLY if you win. Escrow paid by the buyer .Thanks to all forum members whose auction templates I’ve borrowed/ stolen/ bastardised- too many to mention.

comments.author: Mbitr
comments.body: Edited the post - apologies - I’ve put Lot 1 and Lot 2 so it’s easier to bid  Bids so far Lot 2 -0.001BTC Bullion-n-BTC

I have never seen a paersafe that wasnt a full pageGot an answerLot 1 .0001 BTCLot 2 .0025 BTCGlad you got an answer  To be honest I don’t know too much about these papersafe wallets - perhaps some more knowledgeable members can help out  Don’t worry about spamming up the sales thread

comments.body: They are very similar and open like those rebate checks that come in the mail.

Apologies
